general_advisory: As per the extended range forecast, minimum temperatures may vary between districts during the week. Farmers are advised to conduct harvesting, sowing, and spraying operations accordingly. Proper care of crops and animals is recommended. Sow Rabi crops and start summer Paddy nursery sowing where irrigation is available.

advisory: There is expected rainfall, so delay harvesting and ensure safe storage of paddy crop
Use 'Super Grain Bag' or proper storage methods to avoid damage
Monitor groundnut crop for insect attacks
Use insecticides if necessary after rainfall
Use straw mulching for moisture retention
Monitor against Diamond back moth in cauliflower
Ensure clean drinking water for cattle
Maintain proper ventilation in poultry sheds
Provide external heat source for warmth
